---
title: Addresses
description: A guide in my new Starlight docs site.
---

```d2
direction: right
Generator: {shape: circle}
Account: {
  Public Key -- Private Key
}
Random Seed -> Generator
Generator -> Account
```

```d2
direction: right
Scenario - Account 1 Rekeyed to Account 2: {
  Account 1: {
    shape: sql_table
    Address: RE...KEYED
    Balance: 200,000
    Auth-Addr: SIGNS...FOR
  }
  Account 2: {
    shape: sql_table
    Address: SIGNS...FOR
    Balance: 100,000
    Auth-Addr: ""
  }
  Account 1 -> Account 2
}
```
